inclusion.criterion: Patients with reproductive potential must use an effective method of contraception
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If female of childbearing potential, the patient must have a negative pregnancy test.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy, EGFR targeted therapy or radiation therapy for HNSCC.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of prior invasive malignancy diagnosed within the last three years other than local stage non-melanoma skin cancer.
